name: Bad killer game
description:
This is the best multiplayer rpg-spy-stealth-action-shooter ever. That's all I can tell you about this game.

Rules:

In this game you should play with one friend. One of you will be a sniper, and the other will be a spy. Spy's task to complete all objective. Sniper's task to find and to kill the spy. Spy can use many gadgets, but sniper can choose maps. 

You can find controls in the game. 

My vk profile: https://vk.com/dimoyok

Alternative vk link: https://vk.com/id166670333

DimoyokInc group VK: https://vk.com/dimoyokinc
